title.narrative: Favourable social norms, attitudes and behaviours are promoted at community and individual levels to prevent VAW

description.narrative: Mobilise Women, girls, men and boys at the community and individual level to combat violence against women, enhance the capacity of Government institutions, organisations of women, young women, men and media to implement gender transformative approach and support with Women´s rights groups and relevant CSOs to share knowledge, networking and advocacy for GEWE;

title.narrative: SN_DRF

Women's rights groups and relevant CSOs are better supported to use social accountability mechanisms to support their advocacy and influence on prevention and response to VAWG including SGBV/HP and GEWE more broadly (SLI Output 6.2)

description.narrative: UN Women will support CSO to create a platform for advocacya on issues related to SGBV and VAWG

description.narrative: UN Women will support CSOs to participate in different foruns , plataforms and networks that will allow them to change experiences and increase their knowledge on SGBV and VAWG. It will also include support on production of knowledge
